summary: This mod adds two Dremora characters that are at your command!
descriptionHtml:
[size=40][color=red]Besties Mod!! Please Read[/color][/size]

This mod adds the one race that you never see enough of! The Dremora race!! Meet Dremora King Durin(Yes I got the name from The Hobbit!) and Dremora Queen Eclipse! They can help you with anything and you will eventually be able to marry the queen just to make the king mad! Get Ultimate Follower Overhaul to get them both at your side! Just search UFO! This is my first mod so please rate and tell me what i can do to make it better! Queen Eclipse is located in Dead Man\'s Drink in Falkreath and King Durin is located in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun!

[size=25][color=green][b] Please remeber that this is my first mod!![/b][/size][/color]
author: Poseidon8734

files.name: Besties
